mainText:
Steve,

RIP with the title "Innovator" "Designer" "Father" and "Passionate Giver" to
the world.
You just cannot imagine how much you have changed our life style in our
daily life.
Seems like we takes things for granted until someone close to you is gone
and then you reflect back all the great things he/she done.

RIP...   we will not forget you.  the world will not forget you.   if the
iPod, iPhone, iPad can speak, they too will not forget you.
author: Marty
